snippet.title: Z DAWN | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Z Dawn is a fast-paced turn-based in which you have to survive in the aftermath of a zombie apocalypse. The ultimate goal is to find a cure and evacuate the survivors. To survive, you must scavenge for supplies and deal with many random encounters. Build, upgrade your encampment and deal with zombies, zombie bosses, raiders and much more!

Get it now on Steam! 
30% OFF SPECIAL DEAL ENDS SOON 👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/872680/Z_Dawn

#zdawn
